mapper.select: SELECT pso.*, le.EMP_NAME, lp.EMP_NAME as seller_name, psa.PHONE,psa.ADDRESS, p.PNAME, cy.cityName, a.AREANAME, pg.GOODS_NAME FROM PAOPAO_SHOPPING_ORDER pso LEFT JOIN LX_EMP le ON pso.EMP_ID=le.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN LX_EMP lp ON pso.SELLER_EMP_ID=lp.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN PAOPAO_SHOPPING_ADDRESS psa ON pso.ADDRESS_ID=psa.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN PROVINCE p ON pso.PROVINCEID=p.PROVINCEID LEFT JOIN CITY cy ON pso.CITYID=cy.CITYID LEFT JOIN AREA a ON pso.AREAID=a.AREAID LEFT JOIN PAOPAO_GOODS pg ON pso.GOODS_ID=pg.GOODS_ID WHERE pso.ORDER_NO=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAOPAO_SHOPPING_ORDER SET STATUS='5' ,COMPLETION_TIME=#{time}, ACCEPT_TIME=#{time} WHERE #{time}-PAY_TIME >#{period} AND PAY_STATUS='1' AND STATUS = '6'
